references.reason: This paper introduced the concept of few-shot learning in large language models, which is highly relevant to the paper's focus on accelerating autoregressive models.

references.paper_title: Llama: Open and efficient foundation language models
references.reason: This paper introduced the Llama large language model, which is used as one of the main models for experimentation and comparison in the research.

references.paper_title: Medusa: Simple LLM inference acceleration framework with multiple decoding heads
references.reason: This paper presents a method to accelerate the inference speed of LLMs by using multiple decoding heads which is related to the main idea of the paper.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduced the score-based generative modeling approach, which is related to the flow matching technique used in the research.

references.paper_title: Visual autoregressive modeling: Scalable image generation via next-scale prediction
references.reason: This paper introduced the VAR model, which is used as one of the main models for experimentation and comparison in the research.
